name: Memory Trainer
description: A beautiful game for practice of memory. Open the cards and remember their location to find a pair of the same and remove them from the Board.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Core2Duo Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD2000 Storage: 50 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: QuadCore Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD2000 or better Storage: 100 MB available space
